channel.title: This Blog on क्षणभंगुर
channel.description: Recent content in This Blog on क्षणभंगुर

item.title: About
item.description: Blog's title - क्षणभंगुर I like the execise of naming events in general because it helps one give thought to what is the event about and how is it relevant to one's time or space.. This blog is named shan-n-bhang-oor, which means something that gets destroyed in an instant. The origin of my thinking about this particular word comes from my conversations with my first boss and good friend, George Attokaran.
